page.title: 17HOME LIFE -DUNTON GREEN AREA
page.content: From a small survey that was made the following information was discovered: Use of leisure time in descending order- a)watching television;b)eating; c)games/sport For families with oldest child 15- at least one of the weekend days was arranged for the family to be together but most children eat an evening meal looking at television or not with their parents. Convenience foods are mainly eaten at these meals. Sevenoaks is used as a local centre for young people:the main forms of entertainment there include : cinema, amateur theatre,disco evenings, a new swimming pool, community centre. Teenage parties arranged by groups are common - the difficulties with 'gatecrashers' is not as marked in this area as in some parts.
